dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 4751 IH: No Taxpayer Funding For Climate Zealots Advancing Radical Schemes Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Roy (for himself, Mrs. Miller of Illinois, Mr. Gosar, Ms. Mace, Mr. Donalds, Mr. Perry, Mr. Weber of Texas, Mr. Moran, Mr. Rosendale, Mr. Biggs, Mr. Duncan, Mr. Good of Virginia, Mr. Webster of Florida, Mr. Tiffany, Mrs. Boebert, Ms. Hageman, Mr. Ogles, Mr. Langworthy, Mr. Massie, Mr. Crenshaw, Mrs. Luna, Mr. Bean of Florida, Mr. Posey, Mr. Timmons, Mr. Mooney, Mr. Bishop of North Carolina, and Mr. Norman) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To prohibit Federal funding for the Special Presidential Envoy for Climate.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the No Taxpayer Funding For Climate Zealots Advancing Radical Schemes Act or the No Taxpayer Funding For CZARS Act.

Notwithstanding any other provision of law, no Federal funds may be used for the Special Presidential Envoy for Climate, including for salary, administrative, and travel expenses of the Special Presidential Envoy for Climate and for any other activity of the Special Presidential Envoy for Climate.
